# The `HTTPClient.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains the declarations of the HTTPClient library for issuing HTTP requests and handling the responses. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file contains the declarations of the HTTPClient library for issuing HTTP requests and handling the responses.
